blog.description: You have reached the tumblr of Tony Stark. After making Banner get a blog here I finally gave in and made a public one myself. Ask me things or just enjoy the show, choice is yours. I check the tag "sarcastictonystark" and you can @tag me Not currently accepting M!As Currently accepting compliments None of the images are mine, just the words between them. title: Monster
body:
“Have you ever asked yourself, do monsters make war, or does war make monsters?”

Six

I paced back and forth in my living room as I waited for Rogers to arrive. I’d spent most of the afternoon furiously scrubbing the place clean just to keep my mind from wandering. I hadn’t seen…

Read more…

summary: Can I please get number 31 with Tony Stark please😊😊
question: Can I please get number 31 with Tony Stark please😊😊
answer:
Drabbles for my Valentine (Bed Sharing + Tony Stark)

A/N: So this matching something I have already written and posted (warm beds and bodies), so I’m just gonna repost it for this request. Please enjoy!

Drabbles for my Valentine Prompt List is in my bio!

Tony, being the ever so selfish person he was, treated the whole team to a vacation to the beach, and nice weekend away from the stressful worries that were apart of being an Avenger. It was the first night and of course, it led to lots and lots of drinking, as this things typically went, due to this groups nature. When Thor brought out the Asgardian Mead, Tony decided to call it a night, not having had any drinks, but was extremely tired due to the past week.

Leaving the big entertainment room, and walking down the corridor, leading to the rooms, he asked Jarvis which one belong to him.

“Sir, Room #204 is yours.” Jarvis answered, his voice coming out of the walls. The first thing Tony did when they arrived was load Jarvis into the system.

“Thanks bud.” he slurred with eyes barely open, slowly pushing open the door, and quickly collapsing on the bed, forgoing the idea of changing or a shower. Within seconds of his head hitting the pillow, unconsciousness washed over him.

You, on the other hand, did have stuff to drink. And boy, did you drink. When Thor pulled out his Asgardian Mead, you jumped from the couch, partially spilling the drink already in your hand. It continued throughout the night, you just soaking it all up, but still balancing your alcohol with your hearty foods, because everyone knows you like to eat.

After most of the bottles had been slurped up by the team, everyone started to slug off to their individual rooms. Stumbling to your room, you kept a hand on the way, while you lazily asked Jarvis what your room number was.

“You room is #204, Miss Y/L/N.” It was said with the emotionless tone any robotic voice would have, but if anyone had overhead this, and when Jarvis had talked with Tony, they would catch onto his playful teasing tone, that just barely brought any life to his voice.

As you open your door, you stumble into the room, taking a big sigh of relief at the sight of your bed. It was covered in pillows, and you just loved to sleep with tons of pillows. Your fuzzy mind decided to take off your jeans, but didn’t want to put any more effort in, so just slept in your shirt and underwear. Fall into the bed, you instantly grabbed hold of the closest pillow, cuddling into it. A content hum washed over you, as the darkness slowly crept over your mind. You fell asleep fast, and it most definitely didn’t help with how warm the pillows were.

The first thing you felt was your head pounding, and when you opened your eyes you thought you were blind due to seeing nothing. But after adjusting you realized it was still dark outside and the only light shining in the room was the alarm clock on the table side that read 3:08. Groaning you shifted, stretching slightly against the big pillows. What you didn’t expect was for them to move and groan as well.

With a shriek and a spike in adrenaline, you jumped, sitting upward in the bed, causing the mass next to you to groan further, and sit up as well.

“TONY?! What the hell are you doing in my bed?!” you yelled, in complete shock.

With eyes barely open, he grumbled back, “What I should be asking you, is what are you doing in my bed?”

“Your bed?” you exclaimed, “No, this is my room.”

“Y/N, no it’s not just ask Jarvis.”

You gave him a menacing glare, well the best you could give with a hangover face, and bed hair. “Jarvis, who’s room is this?”

“It’s yours ma’am.”

“HA!” you pointed, knowing you were right, but before you could celebrate any further, Jarvis interrupted you.

“But I also told Mr. Stark that this was his room as well.” Confusion clouded both of your faces,

“Why the fuck?” Tony asked, clearly angry, and very clearly wanting his sleep. He was not a morning person I’ve realized.

“With certain calculations, I thought it would be beneficial for you two to sleep together. Human contact has been proven to increase happiness levels.”

“Okay….” Now both you and Tony were looking at each other, knowing what Jarvis was trying to do, but not really knowing what to do next.

Tony blinked, nodded, and then layed back down, shifting slightly before closing his eyes.

Cocking your head you asked, “What are you doing?”

“Well, I’m too tired to go back to my room, so I’m staying.”

“Huh, okay then. You laid down, and then shifted so you were practically laying on top of Tony. Cuddling your cheek into his arm, you whispered, “Be warned. I’m a cuddle-er.”

Tony chuckled, his chest rumbling, sending pleasant vibrations through you. “That’s perfectly fine sweet cheeks. Plus, Jarvis say to do just that.”

PERMANENT TAG LIST:

  • @delicatecapnerd
  • @super-complicated
  • @fitzsimmons-is-forever
  • @gingerwritess
  • @feistybaby
  • @spidermanswifi
  • @twentyonewinchesters
  • @fratboievans
  • @drakesfiance

“You room is #204, Miss Y/L/N.” It was said with the emotionless tone any robotic voice would have, but if anyone had overhead this, and when Jarvis had talked with Tony, they would catch onto his playful teasing tone, that just barely brought any life to his voice.

As you open your door, you stumble into the room, taking a big sigh of relief at the sight of your bed. It was covered in pillows, and you just loved to sleep with tons of pillows. Your fuzzy mind decided to take off your jeans, but didn’t want to put any more effort in, so just slept in your shirt and underwear. Fall into the bed, you instantly grabbed hold of the closest pillow, cuddling into it. A content hum washed over you, as the darkness slowly crept over your mind. You fell asleep fast, and it most definitely didn’t help with how warm the pillows were.

The first thing you felt was your head pounding, and when you opened your eyes you thought you were blind due to seeing nothing. But after adjusting you realized it was still dark outside and the only light shining in the room was the alarm clock on the table side that read 3:08. Groaning you shifted, stretching slightly against the big pillows. What you didn’t expect was for them to move and groan as well.

With a shriek and a spike in adrenaline, you jumped, sitting upward in the bed, causing the mass next to you to groan further, and sit up as well.

“TONY?! What the hell are you doing in my bed?!” you yelled, in complete shock.

With eyes barely open, he grumbled back, “What I should be asking you, is what are you doing in my bed?”

“Your bed?” you exclaimed, “No, this is my room.”

“Y/N, no it’s not just ask Jarvis.”

You gave him a menacing glare, well the best you could give with a hangover face, and bed hair. “Jarvis, who’s room is this?”

“It’s yours ma’am.”

“HA!” you pointed, knowing you were right, but before you could celebrate any further, Jarvis interrupted you.

“But I also told Mr. Stark that this was his room as well.” Confusion clouded both of your faces,

“Why the fuck?” Tony asked, clearly angry, and very clearly wanting his sleep. He was not a morning person I’ve realized.

“With certain calculations, I thought it would be beneficial for you two to sleep together. Human contact has been proven to increase happiness levels.”

“Okay….” Now both you and Tony were looking at each other, knowing what Jarvis was trying to do, but not really knowing what to do next.

Tony blinked, nodded, and then layed back down, shifting slightly before closing his eyes.

Cocking your head you asked, “What are you doing?”

“Well, I’m too tired to go back to my room, so I’m staying.”

“Huh, okay then. You laid down, and then shifted so you were practically laying on top of Tony. Cuddling your cheek into his arm, you whispered, “Be warned. I’m a cuddle-er.”

Tony chuckled, his chest rumbling, sending pleasant vibrations through you. “That’s perfectly fine sweet cheeks. Plus, Jarvis say to do just that.”

PERMANENT TAG LIST:

  • @delicatecapnerd
  • @super-complicated
  • @fitzsimmons-is-forever
  • @gingerwritess
  • @feistybaby
  • @spidermanswifi
  • @twentyonewinchesters
  • @fratboievans
  • @drakesfiance
trail.content:
Drabbles for my Valentine (Bed Sharing + Tony Stark)

A/N: So this matching something I have already written and posted (warm beds and bodies), so I’m just gonna repost it for this request. Please enjoy!

Drabbles for my Valentine Prompt List is in my bio!

Tony, being the ever so selfish person he was, treated the whole team to a vacation to the beach, and nice weekend away from the stressful worries that were apart of being an Avenger. It was the first night and of course, it led to lots and lots of drinking, as this things typically went, due to this groups nature. When Thor brought out the Asgardian Mead, Tony decided to call it a night, not having had any drinks, but was extremely tired due to the past week.

Leaving the big entertainment room, and walking down the corridor, leading to the rooms, he asked Jarvis which one belong to him.

“Sir, Room #204 is yours.” Jarvis answered, his voice coming out of the walls. The first thing Tony did when they arrived was load Jarvis into the system.

“Thanks bud.” he slurred with eyes barely open, slowly pushing open the door, and quickly collapsing on the bed, forgoing the idea of changing or a shower. Within seconds of his head hitting the pillow, unconsciousness washed over him.

You, on the other hand, did have stuff to drink. And boy, did you drink. When Thor pulled out his Asgardian Mead, you jumped from the couch, partially spilling the drink already in your hand. It continued throughout the night, you just soaking it all up, but still balancing your alcohol with your hearty foods, because everyone knows you like to eat.

After most of the bottles had been slurped up by the team, everyone started to slug off to their individual rooms. Stumbling to your room, you kept a hand on the way, while you lazily asked Jarvis what your room number was.

“You room is #204, Miss Y/L/N.” It was said with the emotionless tone any robotic voice would have, but if anyone had overhead this, and when Jarvis had talked with Tony, they would catch onto his playful teasing tone, that just barely brought any life to his voice.

As you open your door, you stumble into the room, taking a big sigh of relief at the sight of your bed. It was covered in pillows, and you just loved to sleep with tons of pillows. Your fuzzy mind decided to take off your jeans, but didn’t want to put any more effort in, so just slept in your shirt and underwear. Fall into the bed, you instantly grabbed hold of the closest pillow, cuddling into it. A content hum washed over you, as the darkness slowly crept over your mind. You fell asleep fast, and it most definitely didn’t help with how warm the pillows were.

The first thing you felt was your head pounding, and when you opened your eyes you thought you were blind due to seeing nothing. But after adjusting you realized it was still dark outside and the only light shining in the room was the alarm clock on the table side that read 3:08. Groaning you shifted, stretching slightly against the big pillows. What you didn’t expect was for them to move and groan as well.

With a shriek and a spike in adrenaline, you jumped, sitting upward in the bed, causing the mass next to you to groan further, and sit up as well.

“TONY?! What the hell are you doing in my bed?!” you yelled, in complete shock.

With eyes barely open, he grumbled back, “What I should be asking you, is what are you doing in my bed?”

“Your bed?” you exclaimed, “No, this is my room.”

“Y/N, no it’s not just ask Jarvis.”

You gave him a menacing glare, well the best you could give with a hangover face, and bed hair. “Jarvis, who’s room is this?”

“It’s yours ma’am.”

“HA!” you pointed, knowing you were right, but before you could celebrate any further, Jarvis interrupted you.

“But I also told Mr. Stark that this was his room as well.” Confusion clouded both of your faces,

“Why the fuck?” Tony asked, clearly angry, and very clearly wanting his sleep. He was not a morning person I’ve realized.

“With certain calculations, I thought it would be beneficial for you two to sleep together. Human contact has been proven to increase happiness levels.”

“Okay….” Now both you and Tony were looking at each other, knowing what Jarvis was trying to do, but not really knowing what to do next.

Tony blinked, nodded, and then layed back down, shifting slightly before closing his eyes.

Cocking your head you asked, “What are you doing?”

“Well, I’m too tired to go back to my room, so I’m staying.”

“Huh, okay then. You laid down, and then shifted so you were practically laying on top of Tony. Cuddling your cheek into his arm, you whispered, “Be warned. I’m a cuddle-er.”

Tony chuckled, his chest rumbling, sending pleasant vibrations through you. “That’s perfectly fine sweet cheeks. Plus, Jarvis say to do just that.”
